1.text: Bring 6 cups (1.4 L) of water to a boil in a saucepan.

2.vid: /4/44/Make Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Drain the water from the macaroni.

4.text: Place the macaroni, margarine, milk, and cheese sauce mix into the saucepan.
4.vid: /4/41/Make Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Stir the ingredients to combine them.
5.vid: /7/74/Make Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Serve the macaroni and cheese immediately or store it in the refrigerator.

7.text: Replace some of the margarine with American cheese to make the dish creamier.

8.text: Mix in bacon and chipotle for a spicy and smoky dish.
8.vid: /b/bc/Make Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Add sriracha, ginger, green onions, and panko for a more decadent dish.
9.vid: /4/4d/Make Kraft Macaroni and Cheese Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Use cherry tomatoes and basil to make a Margarita-themed dish.

11.text: Add chili beans and cheddar cheese to make a hearty meal.

12.text: Add your favorite powdered seasonings to jazz it up.
